title: Simultaneous removal of Acetaminophen, Sulfamethoxazole, and Iohexol from real wastewater in continuous mode by immobilized Sulfur-Doped Bi2O3/MnO2 photocatalyst
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00501E, Paper
Vishal Kumar Parida, Mario Vino Lincy G, Suneel K Srivastava, SHAMIK CHOWDHURY, Ashok Kumar Gupta
Advanced oxidation processes like heterogeneous photocatalysis can degrade recalcitrant compounds. However, the overall potency of most semiconductor-based photocatalysts in continuous operation and real wastewater matrices remains inadequate. This study investigates...
